title: Impacts of polyethylene glycol (PEG) dispersity on protein adsorption, pharmacokinetics, and biodistribution of PEGylated gold nanoparticles

Monodisperse PEG-AuNPs in blood vessels can avoid being rapidly cleared by the reticuloendothelial system and thus accumulate in tumor tissue.
